Name: Reality
About the game: Overview Reality is a single-player first-person action horror game. Use stealth and shooting to fight off a wide variety of enemies. Wander freely throughout the realistic school building and its surroundings in search of a certain schoolgirl. The Story You wake up in an abandoned school in the middle of the night and follow her trail as she wanders into an unusual space. Through a number of strange experiences, you will arrive at a startling revelation. Gameplay In 'Reality,' a wide variety of enemies, each with a different weakness. Pick up the documents that uncover the enemy's weaknesses and throw the appropriate items at them. You can also avoid combat by hiding behind desks and lockers to avoid depleting your items. Use recovery pills and antidotes to survive the vast map and escape the crazy world. Skill Points Each time you progress through a bizarre experience, you will earn skill points. Skill points can be used to toughen up various skills. Monsters that mutate the player's skills will also appear. About the live video Posting and distribution (including monetization) of live video clips of this game is not a problem.
